Action.author: scottz
Action.body: FAB-5676 is not done in v1.1, so this is an invalid testcase in v1.1. The upgrade doc now specifies the need for the operator (out of band) to delete the chaincode images while the peer is stopped when changing the peer version. When we did that, things worked. It is now a part of the fabric-test/features/upgrade.feature test.
